topicTitle: My Gmod taking longer to fix than anticipated.

posts.postText: In case you didn't notice, I have been off Gmod for quite some time, because well, It is broken.  I know what the problem is more or less, but fixing it is a pain, so I have no idea when I'll be back.  So if you want to see me, I'll be on TF2 or CSS whenever the Server has players.

IDK, When I run Garry's Mod I begin to get Glitches and after 5 minutes Blue Screen of Death
 http://www.remove-virtumonde.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/05/blue_screen_of_death.gif 
Something like that.  IT SUCKS!!!!!
TF2 and CSS works fine which has me wondering, and yes I have Reinstalled Gmod, still nothing.
Delete your gmod folder? I dunno >.>

Contact steam support and ask why the shit you're getting a BSOD from playing Gmod D:< 

If you don't get a good response, SUE THEIR ASSES :>

Edit: Go to Mr. Gash's link below. Nao.

>> http://www.facepunch.com/threads/658942-Blue-Screen-Of-Death 

What is this? I don't even..

Edit: Go ro the link above ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
I know what the problem is, I just found it funny how Tf2 is unaffected, a friend of mine who is Uber computer geek can fix it, but he is dragging his ass (knowing him not surprising).
Really I put this up to tell people y i have been gone.
